channel.title: Death help

item.title: Death help
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

// If killed apply dead
           if ((absX >= 3093 && absX <= 3117 && absY >= 3921 && absY <= 3946 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) {
    IsDead = false;
    playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
    currentHealth = playerLevel[3];
    NewHP = playerLevel[3];
        refreshSkills();
    updateRequired = true;
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
        teleportToX = 2740;
        teleportToY = 9489;
        sendMessage("you have died at fun pk ");
    }
    else if (IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) {
        refreshSkills();
        ApplyDead();
    }

That is my apply dead code, now… i need someone to tell me WHY no one is DYING WHEN SOMEONE TRYS TO PK THEM… >.< it works fine with 1 hit k0 weapons, but you get hp glitched like they keep healing, if you atk them normaly, please help me[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2009, 05:35:17 pm[/size][hr]HELP ANYONE???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2009, 05:46:28 pm[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic
